head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COULOUCOUNDIS, ANTHONY G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COULOUCOUNDIS, ANTHONY G.

block.p: COULOUCOUNDIS-Anthony G. The Allen-Stevenson School community expresses its heartfelt sympathy to the entire Couloucoundis family. Mr. Couloucoundis was the grandfather of Anthony C. Parry, Class of '05 and was also the beloved father of the late Anthony G. Couloucoundis II, Class of '81. We are grateful for the continued loyalty and generosity of this special family.

COULOUCOUNDIS-Anthony G. The Allen-Stevenson School community expresses its heartfelt sympathy to the entire Couloucoundis family. Mr. Couloucoundis was the grandfather of Anthony C. Parry, Class of '05 and was also the beloved father of the late Anthony G. Couloucoundis II, Class of '81. We are grateful for the continued loyalty and generosity of this special family.
